abstract: Lord Chatfield demands Brit naval and aerial aid to Greece
snippet: LONDON, Oct. 31 (UP)--Lord Chatfield, former First Sea Lord, called tonight for "violent blows" against Italy in defense of Greece and Great Britain's stake in the Mediterranean....

headline.main: HARD BRITISH BLOW AT ITALY DEMANDED; Former First Sea Lord Calls for All Possible Naval and Air Aid to Greece

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Oct. 31 (UP)--Lord Chatfield, former First Sea Lord, called tonight for "violent blows" against Italy in defense of Greece and Great Britain's stake in the Mediterranean.
